Type.Name: NewFunc

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate Gtk.Widget NewFunc(XML xml, GType widget_type, WidgetInfo info);
.class public auto ansi sealed NewFunc extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.remarks: this delegate is called used for custom methods to create widgets.
